GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Cancel pending work at closing a MIDI substream

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 5e5fe2b6065541c6216a7a003b0cddf386be0d2d. For more details please see the references link.
